statements: SELECT * FROM waste_collection_costs;
SELECT company_name, collection_cost FROM waste_collection_costs;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_costs WHERE collection_cost > 100;
SELECT company_name, collection_date FROM waste_collection_costs ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT id, company_name, collection_date, collection_cost FROM waste_collection_costs WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT company_name, collection_cost FROM waste_collection_costs WHERE collection_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY company_name DESC, collection_cost ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_costs WHERE collection_cost >= 1000 ORDER BY collection_date ASC, company_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, collection_date, company_name, collection_cost FROM waste_collection_costs WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, SUM(collection_cost) AS total_cost FROM waste_collection_costs GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_cost > 5000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT AVG(collection_cost) AS avg_cost, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM waste_collection_costs WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionServices;
SELECT service_id, provider_name, cost_per_ton FROM WasteCollectionServices WHERE cost_per_ton > 100;
SELECT service_id, service_type, provider_name, cost_per_ton FROM WasteCollectionServices ORDER BY cost_per_ton DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionServices WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01' AND collection_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT area_name, total_collection_cost, average_cost_per_ton FROM WasteCollectionAreas WHERE average_cost_per_ton < 50;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionServices WHERE cost_per_ton > 50 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, SUM(cost_per_ton) AS total_cost FROM WasteCollectionServices GROUP BY provider_name HAVING COUNT(service_id) > 1;
SELECT area_name, total_collection_cost FROM WasteCollectionAreas WHERE last_collection_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionServices JOIN WasteCollectionAreas ON WasteCollectionServices.service_id = WasteCollectionAreas.area_id WHERE WasteCollectionServices.collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(service_id) AS num_services FROM WasteCollectionServices GROUP BY provider_name HAVING COUNT(service_id) > 2 ORDER BY num_services DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_costs;
SELECT cost_id, collection_date, cost FROM waste_collection_costs ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, city, state FROM collection_areas WHERE state='CA';
SELECT * FROM cost_optimization WHERE optimization_description LIKE '%reduce%';
SELECT area_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM waste_collection_costs GROUP BY area_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_costs WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT cost_id,cost FROM waste_collection_costs WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT c.*,ca.area_name,ca.city FROM cost_optimization c JOIN collection_areas ca ON c.area_id = ca.area_id WHERE ca.state = 'NY';
SELECT SUM(cost) AS total_cost, AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM waste_collection_costs WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT city,state FROM collection_areas ORDER BY city ASC, state DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionCosts WHERE company_name = 'ABC Waste Management';
SELECT company_name, cost FROM WasteCollectionCosts WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT area_name, city, region FROM CollectionAreas WHERE region = 'North';
SELECT optimization_id, area_id, optimization_date FROM OptimizationAreas WHERE optimization_type = 'Efficiency' ORDER BY optimization_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CostAnalysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT company_name, cost FROM WasteCollectionCosts WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM CollectionAreas WHERE city = 'New York' AND region = 'East';
SELECT optimization_type, optimization_date FROM OptimizationAreas WHERE area_id = 3 ORDER BY optimization_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CostAnalysis WHERE analysis_type LIKE '%reduction%';
SELECT company_name, cost FROM WasteCollectionCosts WHERE cost > 1000 AND cost < 5000 ORDER BY company_name ASC, cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_services;
SELECT service_name, cost FROM waste_collection_services WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM waste_collection_employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT area_name, city, state FROM waste_collection_areas WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT service_name, cost FROM waste_collection_costs WHERE cost_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT service_name, cost FROM waste_collection_services WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_employees WHERE job_title = 'Driver' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT area_name, city, state FROM waste_collection_areas WHERE state = 'CA' OR city = 'New York'
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM waste_collection_locations ORDER BY city

SELECT service_name, cost, collection_date FROM waste_collection_services JOIN waste_collection_costs ON waste_collection_services.service_id = waste_collection_costs.service_id WHERE cost < 500 AND collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY collection_date ASC LIMIT 10
